channel.title: Pure Nation - #1 Server for Pures!
channel.description:
[center]We are a 1-35defence server, we are based on pures.
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qbVMRV2qW68[/youtube]
Client: https://www.dropbox.com/s/9q98mgtsh9cvx2k/Pure%20Nation%20-%20Offical%20Client%E2%84%A2.rar[/center]

item.title: Pure Nation - #1 Server for Pures!
item.dc:creator: @nicks nicks
item.description:
@nicks wrote:

[quote=“PureNation, post:13, topic:455983”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=558931.msg4087290#msg4087290 date=1345996076]

images that show the server is unique.

what do you mean “pures only” do you have a limit in the server where you can’t get past 35 defence? be more specific. how does this affect armor/defence formulas, etc

Too much to show, but if you try going past 35def there isn’t anything you can use such as rune boots torso ect… only pure items in the game + you can set defence 1-35 1for edge or nh brids or 35for turm for clans.

What an excuse ‘Too much to show’.

Don’t play then…

GL on players with that attitude.
[/quote]

How about this “attitude” go fuck yourself, and i have atm 20+[/quote]
I doubt you have more then yourself on tbh. And please refrain from posting garbage on here please

Read full topic

item.title: Pure Nation - #1 Server for Pures!

item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:14, topic:455983”][quote author=eclipse rsps link=topic=558931.msg4086697#msg4086697 date=1345931906]
This is the dumbest idea for a server ive ever seen.
[/quote][/quote]
I agree but disagree. I agree as it’s pretty stupid and shows the amount of content it has. +1 for being kinda somewhat creative.
